meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spacious.
meanings.sent1: The spaciousnesses of the room allowed for comfortable movement.
meanings.sent2: The spaciousnesses of the field made it perfect for a game of soccer.
meanings.sent3: The cat enjoyed the spaciousnesses of the empty box, claiming it as its new home.
meanings.sent4: Her mind expanded with the spaciousnesses of the new ideas presented in the book.
meanings.sent5: The spaciousnesses of the ocean stretched out endlessly before them, calming their souls.

meanings.definition: The extent or size of a space or area.
meanings.sent1: The spaciousnesses of the warehouse allowed for easy storage of goods.
meanings.sent2: The spaciousnesses of the park provided a peaceful retreat from the city.
meanings.sent3: The astronaut marveled at the spaciousnesses of outer space during the spacewalk.
meanings.sent4: The spaciousnesses of the desert seemed to go on forever under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The spaciousnesses of the concert hall accommodated a large audience for the performance.
